column4: Hello. I have a DualBoot, I have Ubuntu 11-04 64bits, I installed nVidia's propietary driver 270.41.19 in Ubuntu, and I want to install the most recent nVidia's driver to Windows XP 32Bits since I can't find the same one as Linux. Is it possible that the  2 different  divers work in the same system
the two systems are completly seperated.
ubuntu doesn't care which driver you use in windows (and the other way around)
ubuntu doesn't care which driver you use in windows (and the other way around)
